member.name: T:SumTest.Program

member.name: M:SumTest.Program.TestSum(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Function that will return the sum of two numbers in the following conditions: - The sum is tripled if the two input numbers are equal - Otherwise return the sum of the two numbers
member.returns: The sum of the two numbers
